name: HL_JOB_ACT_PARAM_VALUES
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Job Action Parameter Values (I HLR 273) item.

columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the request record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HL_ACTION_PARAM_VAL
columns.description: The value specified for the corresponding action parameter.
